name: Xenographer
description:
In Xenographer you take on the role of a court reporter, documenting tricky trials as accurately as you can. When Earth is suddenly invaded and occupied by hostile aliens, they find a use for your skills onboard the mothership...

This is a proof-of-concept of the first level, which takes place on Earth.

Known bugs:

  • It's possible to type over the edge of the paper occasionally
  • Dragged objects don't stick to the mouse cursor
  • Apostrophes don't work on certain keyboards
  • Resolutions other than 1920*1080 are probably janky as hell
  • No actual alien invasion happens, not a bug so much as a major missing feature
  • The typewriter is a yellow rectangle with keys glued onto it
Made for #1GAM
